description: This file sets up and runs a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) agent using various components such as knowledge base, vector database, and a web playground interface. It includes configuration for a PostgreSQL database with pgvector, defines an agent with specific instructions, and starts a web server for interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with knowledge base, model, and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI's embedding models.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base built from PDFs accessible via URLs.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Web interface for interacting with the agent.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Storage backend for agent sessions in PostgreSQL.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Vector database interface using pgvector extension.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server for the playground interface.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data into the system.
